Texts.Eng: In the first slot, place a seed. In the second, place a liquid to feed the plant with. The third slot is for fertilizer. ^orange;Different fertilizers^reset; will result in ^orange;different production and growth rates^reset; for plants.

Texts.Chs: 虽然你可以用锄头、泥土加上自己的双手这种旧方法来种植，但还有另一种选择：^orange;木制托盘^reset;。现在制作一个，你将无时不刻地收获作物。
Texts.Eng: While you can farm the old-fashioned way with a hoe , dirt and your own two hands there is another option: ^orange;Growing Trays^reset;. Build one of these now, and you'll have some plants grown in no time.
